description:
Kasumi is http://anidb.net/ch94633 [Olivia]`s and http://anidb.net/ch94634 [Hanako]`s classmate who dislikes playing games due to her sister`s constant teasing when she was younger. She is very bad at English despite looking like a library girl. She enjoys writing BL fantasies.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Nomura Kasumi
